actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE pipeline_master
SET
camera_id ={{camera.selectedOptionValue}},
model_id ={{model.selectedOptionValue}},
processing_type ={{processing.selectedOptionValue}},
skip_frames ={{Select4Copy.selectedOptionValue}},
do_tracking ={{Checkbox1Copy.isChecked?"Yes":"No"}},
zone_flag ={{Checkbox2Copy.isChecked?"Yes":"No"}},
zone_topleft_x ={{Input3Copy.text}},
zone_topleft_y ={{Input4Copy.text}},
zone_botright_x ={{Input5Copy.text}},
zone_botright_y ={{Input6Copy.text}},
status = {{Switch1Copy.isSwitchedOn?"Active":"Inactive"}},
edited_by = {{Text15.text}},
edited_date = current_timestamp()
WHERE pipeline_id = {{Table1.selectedRow.pipeline_id}};
